TextView.android:text: Hyphenation makes wrapped text easier to read and helps make your UI more adaptive. Starting in Android 13, hyphenation performance is optimized by as much as 200% so you can enable it in your TextView with almost no impact on rendering performance. To enable faster hyphenation, use the fullFast or normalFast frequencies in setHyphenationFrequency().
